mapper.select: select Stock.itemId ,Stock.shopId ,ShopMaster.name as shopName ,sum(Stock.amount) as amount from Stock left join ShopMaster on ShopMaster.id = Stock.shopId where itemId=#{itemId} group by Stock.shopId

select Stock.itemId ,ItemMaster.price ,Stock.shopId ,ShopMaster.name as shopName ,sum(Stock.amount) as amount from Stock left join ShopMaster on ShopMaster.id = Stock.shopId left join ItemMaster on ItemMaster.id = Stock.itemId where itemId=#{itemId} and shopId=#{shopId}
mapper.insert: insert into Stock(itemId, shopId, amount) values(#{itemId}, #{shopId}, #{amount})
